participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and optimistic, always looking for the silver lining in every situation.
participant_1.background: I usually do laundry on the weekends. My best friend is gay. I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have. My family and friends are my favorite people because they are always there for me, no matter what. I'm saving up to buy a new camera.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Confident and creative, always ready to tackle new challenges and inspire others.
participant_2.background: I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way. I am a YouTuber who creates content for my audience. I live in New York City. I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes. I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games.

content.text: Hi, I'm new in town. What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I'm a YouTuber, so I like to create content for my audience. I also love to eat at the local sports bar with my son after his games.
That's cool! What kind of content do you create?
I make videos about everything from beauty to fashion to lifestyle. I also love to do challenges and pranks.
That sounds really fun! I'm not very good at making videos, but I love watching them.
What kind of videos do you like to watch?
I like to watch comedy videos, music videos, and travel videos.
Oh, I love comedy videos too! I also love watching travel videos to see different parts of the world.
Me too! I've always wanted to travel the world, but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing experience.
I know, I know! I'm trying to save up money so I can go on a trip soon.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time.
